game.name: Berserker Penguin
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Unleash chaos in this fast-paced action roguelite. Master precise positioning, manual aiming, and parries to outmaneuver thousands of hostile creatures. Loot powerful upgrades to create synergistic builds, but choose your fights wisely—killing enemies only makes the next ones stronger.
